job.title: Signal Software Engineer (TS/SCI with FS Poly Required)
job.description: If you are a 5 year Signal Software Engineer with a TSSCI and Full Scope Polygraph please read onbrbrWere a small engineering contractor that supports clients in the commercial and government sectors with RF Engineering Analog and Digital Hardware Audio and Video DSP application and embedded software engineering and more We have offices in Maryland Virginia and North Carolina and are currently looking for a Signal Software Engineer at one of these locationsbrbrAll candidates must have an active TSSCI clearance with a Full Scope Poly clearance in order to be processorsbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli Active TSSCI clearance with a Full Scope Polygraphlili Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related fieldlili 7 years of related engineering experience focused on Radio Frequencylili Fourier transforms filtering digital modulation error control codinglili Communication theorylili Signal Analysis tools WVT DVT etclili Digital signal processing adaptive beamformingfiltering demodulationbrliulBONUS POINTSbrulli Software defined radio architectures SCA REDHAWK GNUlili Commercial wireless standardslili Geolocation techniqueslili
